text: ah the virtual desktop it's always been

how come these virtual desktops are

high expectations of

introducing Amazon workspaces Amazon
workspaces is a service that provides a
desktop computer experience to your
users in the AWS Cloud there are lots of
reasons you might want to provide this
perhaps is to give a mobile Workforce a
great desktop experience on any device
wherever they are or maybe it's to meet

corporate data is stored on employee
devices with Amazon workspaces this is
easy your users can access their
desktops from anywhere they have an

same experience across multiple devices
including desktop computers laptops
tablets and whatever the next thing is
your employees want to hook into your

Office as well as being able to deploy

Amazon workspaces also uses optimized
Network protocols to ensure a high
quality experience and make efficient
use of network
bandwidth Amazon workspaces lets you
easily integrate into existing on
premises identity systems like Microsoft
active directory that way you can
control access to Amazon workspaces
using existing systems and users can use
the credentials they already have from
your corporate Network to log on and
access resources seamlessly
getting started with Amazon workspaces
is simple after you've connected to your

you can manage Amazon workspaces
desktops with the management tools
